title: Angled script in New Work Magazine
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_1_6270.jpg)

I guess this is custom, but I’d love to be proven otherwise. Does anyone know it, or something similar?
author: frode frank

comments.content:
BTW, there’s an article on Akira Kobayashi in the same edition (No. 3)  
 [http://www.newworkmag.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052301/http:/www.newworkmag.com/ "http://www.newworkmag.com/")
I saw something similar a while back, but I can’t remember where. Which is just useless, sorry. ;)
Seems to be it, although customized! Thanks, this is a gem.
